headline: Constellation CEO: 'We Produce Enough Energy to Power Mexico'

headline: NLR ETF Climbs 75% in One Year as Uranium Miners Ride $100 Per Pound Breakout
summary: The VanEck Uranium and Nuclear ETF has surged 75% over the past year, climbing from around $84 in January 2025 to $146.60 today. With $3.6 billion in assets, this fund concentrates on uranium miners and nuclear utilities, betting that renewed interest in carbon-free baseload power will translate into sustained demand for nuclear fuel and infrastructure. ... NLR ETF Climbs 75% in One Year as Uranium Miners Ride $100 Per Pound Breakout
